Chinese Pickled Vegetables

WHITE RICE VINEGAR 1 Cup 
ONION SHALLOT 6 Numbers 
CARROT 2 Numbers 
CUCUMBERS 2 Numbers 
WHITE SUGAR 1 Cup 
SALT 1 Teaspoons

Cut the cucumbers (seeds remove them) onion shallots, carrot batons in this sprinkle into salt and toss them after 15 minutes ooze out moisture, add red and green chilies ,sugar ,rice vinegar cover this vegetables keep it for 1 hour. this pickle store for 1 week
Vegetable Kung Pao

Ginger Garlic Paste 2 Tablespoons 
Sesame Seed Oil 2 Tablespoons 
Red Chili Sauce-Optional 1 Teaspoons 
Red Chilies(slit)-Optional few 
Sugar Pinch 
Ajinomoto Pinch 
Rice Vinegar 2 Tablespoons 
Pepper Pinch 
Soy Sauce 2 Tablespoons 
Vegetable Stock 1 Cup 
Mixed Vegetables 1 Numbers 
Red Chilli (whole) few 
Peanuts(roasted) few 
Spring Onions few 
Tofu few Piece 
Corn Starch 1 Tablespoons

1. Dice the vegetables in a way that they all get cooked in same frame of time. 
2.In a bowl add stock,soy sauce,pepper,rice vinegar,ajinomotto,sugar,redchillies,chilli sauce.stir well. 
3.In a pan add sesame seed oil and add red chillies to it .saute till they r brown.Add ginger garlic to it and vegetables to it.Saute well. 
4.Add the mixture to the sauted vegetables and cook well till water starts drying. 
5. Season it with peanuts,spring onions and tofu to the sauce.Add salt if required and dilluted corn starch to thicken the paste. 
6.Its ready to be served.
VEGETABLE CHOW MEIN

Beans 1/2 Cup 
Cabbage 1 Cup 
Capsicum (colores) 1 Numbers 
Carrot 1 Big 
Onion 1 Big 
Oyaster Sauce (mushrooms) 2 Tablespoons 
Soya Sauce 1 Tablespoons 
Salt To Taste 
Sugar 1 Teaspoons 
Ginger 1 Tablespoons 
Garlic 1 Tablespoons 
Vegetable Stock 1 Cup 
Pepper 1/2 Teaspoons 
Spring Onions 2 Tablespoons

1.Take a mixing bowl add vegetable stock add sugar salt oyaster sauce(mushrooms) soya sauce. If you want add corn starch you can add it. \n2. Take a pan heat the oil on a medium flame add ginger , garlic add oinion chopped, add 3 colores of capsicum, beans, cabbage, and toss them ,getting sweat it add sauce mixture,pinch of pepper and add noodles and spring onions ,so ready the chow mien noodles this is milled chow mein.\n3. you can serve it
CHICKEN CHOW MEIN

SALT to taste
PEPPER 1 Teaspoons 
GARLIC CHOPPED 1 Teaspoons
GINGER CHOPPED 1 Teaspoons
VENIGAR 1 Tablespoons 
BOTTLE CHILLY SAUCE 1 Tablespoons
OYSTER 1 Tablespoons nSOYA SAUCE 1 Tablespoons
SUGAR 1 Teaspoons
ONIONS 1 Numbers 
CHICKEN STOCK 1 Cup
OIL 2 Tablespoons 
NOODLES 250 Grams 
CHICKEN 200 Grams 
CARROT 1 Numbers 
CAPSICUM (3 COLORES) 1 Cup 
CABBAGE 1 Cup 
SPRING ONIONS 1/2 Cup 
SESAME SEEDS 1 Teaspoons

1. Take one bowl to season the chicken first add pepper,salt,soya sauce(one or two drops) Mix it and keep it aside.
2. Take chicken stock add salt,sugar,pepper soya sauce oyster sauce bottle chilly sauce,venigar and mix it up. Heat the oil in a large sauce pan and add chicken, when chicken is ¾ cooked, add chopped ginger garlic and green,red,yellow capsicum, carrot, cabbage, spring onions, and add sauce mixture.
3. All vegetables and chicken well cooked add noodles, and toss them.
4. Switch off the flame and add spring onions and sesame seeds.
Quails Fry

Oil For Deep Fry 
Coriander Powder 1 Teaspoons 
Garam Masala 1 Teaspoons 
Turmeric 1/4 Teaspoons 
Ginger Garlic Paste 1 Teaspoons 
Coriander Chopped 1 Bunch 
Red Chilly Paste 1 Tablespoons 
All Purpose Flour 1 Teaspoons 
Quail Birds 3 Numbers 
Lime Juice 1/2 Teaspoons

Take Quail bird skin less and give them gashes, Take a bowl add red chilly paste, chopped coriander, ginger, garlic paste, turmeric, garam masala powder, coriander powder, pepper powder, salt, squeezing lime juice, , add all purpose flour, mix this, and take quail apply the made masala on the gashes, and leave it in the refrigerator for 3 to 4 hours. And deep fry them.
Orange Chicken

Chicken Portions 4 Numbers 
Onion, Peeled And Thinly Sliced 1 Numbers 
Dried Rosemary 1/2 Teaspoons 
Ground Ginger 1/2 Teaspoons 
Unsweetened Orange Juice 1 Numbers 
Orange Marmalade 2 Teaspoons

Preheat oven to 180C, 350F, Gas Mark 4. Put chicken portions into casserole dish. Sprinkle over onion, rosemary, ginger and turmeric or paprika. Pour over orange juice and stir in marmalade. Cover and cook for about 45 minutes until the chicken is tender. Serve with boiled rice, noodles or potatoes
Chicken Adobo

Chopped Garlic 2 Tablespoons 
Bay Leaf 2 Numbers 
Soya Sauce 2 Tablespoons 
Rice Vinegar 1 Tablespoons 
Pepper Powder 2 Tablespoons 
Whole Garlic (optional) 4 Numbers 
Chicken 1000 Grams 
Salt To Taste

1. Take a bowl add chicken with skin on and add pepper powder, rice vinegar, Soya sauce, bay leaf, chopped garlic, salt and water rest it for over night.
2. Heat a pan add marinated chicken and cook it for 25 to 30 minutes in a slow flame till chicken is tender, after that, using strainer separate the chicken and sauce liquid.
3. Heat oil in a pan add whole garlic (optional) and add boiled chicken mix it and add sauce liquid, when sauce thickens .
4. switch off the flame. Serve this hot with fried rice.
CHEESE BALLS

Chopped Bell Pepper 2 Tablespoons 
Chopped Parsley 2 Tablespoons 
Finely Chopped Onions 1 Numbers 
Parmesan Cheese 1 Tablespoons 
Cheese 1 Tablespoons 
Egg 4 Numbers 
Flour 100 Grams 
Butter 80 Grams 
Thyme 1/2 Teaspoons 
Salt To Taste 
Water 160 ml

1. Make a choux pastry Take a pan add 160 ml water, 80 g of butter, and mix it, come to a boil reduce the flame and add 100 gm of flour mix it and switch off the flame.\n2. In this add eggs and mix it well, add cheese, parmesan cheese, chopped parsley, chopped bell pepper, finely chopped onions, thyme, slat, mix this well. \n3. Take this batter in one spoon and drop like small dumpling in hot oil at 170 C and deep fry till golden color, Serve this hot with your favorite sauce.
chicken nuggets

Gingergarlic Paste 1 Teaspoons 
Bread Crunches 250 Grams 
Chillie Powder 2 Teaspoons 
Salt 1 To Taste 
Boneless Chicken 500 Grams 
Egg 1 
Aluminium Sheet

clean the chicken with hot water and cut the chicken into small tenders. Then add all the ingredients except egg and bread crunches.marinate the chicken for 10min. Now add egg to the chicken tenders then dip these chicken tenders in the bread crunches make sure those chicken tenders are fully covered with bread crunches now place an aluminium sheet on the grill inside the oven then place all these chicken tenders on that sheet then make it baked in the oven at 250degrees for 20min then again turn the pieces to the other side and bake it for other 20min then ur chicken nuggets are ready to eat serve hot with sauce.
EGG CROQUETTES

Parsley Finely Chopped 2 Tablespoons 
Eggs (beaten) 2 Numbers 
Cheese 3 Tablespoons 
Salt To Taste 
Pepper Powder 1 Teaspoons 
Butter 80 Grams 
Milk 160 ml 
All Purpose Flour 100 Grams 
Eggs (boiled) 4 Numbers 
Cracker Crumbs 1 Cup 
Parmesan Cheese 2 Tablespoons

1. Melt the butter in a pan add the flour cook it, and add milk and mix it well, reduce the flame add pepper powder, salt, mozzeralla cheese, parmesan cheese mix it well.
2. Switch off the flame, add boiled eggs (chopped in pieces) add parsley and transfer in to plate and leave it cool. 
3. Take flour in a plate add pepper powder, salt, mix it well. 
4. Divide the mixture in to equal portions and shape them in your choice. 
5. Dip the dumplings into the beaten egg, then in the flour again in the beaten egg and then cracker crumbs and deep fry the croquettes until golden brown. 
6. Serve hot with sauce.
FISH IN GARLIC SAUCE

Salt To Taste 
Jaggery 1/4 Cup 
Tomato Ketchup 2 Tablespoons 
Chilly Sauce 1 Tablespoons 
Onion 1 Numbers 
Chopped Ginger 1 Teaspoons 
Chopped Garlic 1 Teaspoons 
Oil 3 Tablespoons 
Vinegar 2 Tablespoons 
Soya Sauce 2 Tablespoons 
Fish 1 Numbers 
Fish Stock 1 Cup 
Lemon Juice 2 Tablespoons

1. Take fish make gashes on both sides. Take a bowl add Soya sauce, vinegar, mixes it and pour the sauce on the fish, after marinating for 15 minutes sprinkle the corn flour and dredge it.\n2. Heat oil in a pan add fish; cook in a slow flam. Take another pan heat oil add chopped garlic,chopped ginger, slices of onions, add chilly sauce, Soya sauce, tomato ketchup, add jaggery, salt, lemon juice, add fish stock, add white of spring onions.\n3. Take the sauce and pour it on the fried fish.
STEAMED FISH

Sugar 1 Teaspoons 
Fish Sauce 1 Tablespoons 
Soya Sauce 1 Tablespoons 
Lemon Juice 2 Tablespoons 
Green Chilly 4 Numbers 
Cucumber 1/2 Cup 
Yellow Jukknee 1/2 Cup 
Onion 1 Cup 
Carrot 1/2 Cup 
Fish 1 Numbers 
Salt To Taste 
Spring Onions 2 Tablespoons

1, Take your choice of fish and give gashes on both sides and, stuff lemon grass, ginger pieces in the fish, raw mango pieces put in the gashes. Steam the fish for 4 to 5 minutes. Make a sauce .\n2. Take a bowl add lemon juice, sugar, Soya sauce, fish sauce, and chopped spring onion. After steaming fish add Julliene of yellow jukknee, cucumber, carrot, cover and cook it further till done After 3 minutes take the fish and put it on the plate.\n3. Take the juices of steamed fish; pour it on the sauce, mix it and pour the sauce on the top of the fish. Steamed fish is ready.
SPICY HONEY CHICKEN WINGS

Soya Sauce 1 Teaspoons 
Lime Rind 1 Teaspoons 
Lemon Juice 2 Tablespoons 
Chilly Powder 2 Tablespoons 
Rice Flour 1 Tablespoons 
Turmeric 1/4 Teaspoons 
Salt To Taste 
Oil 1 Cup 
Ginger Garlic Paste 1 Tablespoons 
Chicken Wings 8 Numbers 
Vinegar 1 Teaspoons 
Spring Onions 2 Tablespoons 
Coriander 1 Bunch 
Honey 1 Tablespoons

1.Take chicken wings punching holes help with fork add salt, chilly powder, ginger garlic paste, rice flour, lemon juice and rind, mix all of this, and spread it on the chicken wings in a plate and put it in the refrigerator (1 to 2 hours) preferably over night \n2. Heat oil in a pan and shallow fry the chicken wings till crispy and brown, take it aside. Take same pan add chopped spring onions, chopped coriander, Soya sauce, vinegar, honey, mix it, in this add chicken wings and toss it.
TOMATO EGG DROP SOUP

EGG 2 Numbers 
TOMATO SAUCE/KETCHUP 2 Tablespoons 
SOYA SAUCE 1 Tablespoons 
CORN STARCH 2 Tablespoons 
CLIANTRO LEAVES 1/2 Cup 
DICED RIPE TOMATOES 2 Cup 
CHICKEN 50 Grams 
SALT TO TASTE 
GREEN CHILLIES 2 Slice

1. First cut chicken into small pieces add pinch of salt add corn starch, and add some egg white and mix it.\n2. Drop the chicken pieces into boiling stock. let it Simmer 5 to 7 minutes till the chicken floats on top add some salt, tomatoes, red chilly sauce, and tomato ketchup and Soya sauce, if you like thicker add some corn starch in this take eggs and beat them and pour it into the soup add chopped coriander, server it.
Apples Walnut Caramel Crunch

Ice Water 2 Cup 
Baking Powder 1 Pinch 
Salt To Taste 
All Purpose Flour 2 Tablespoons 
Corn Flour 1 Tablespoons 
Cinnamon Powder 1 Teaspoons 
Sugar 250 Grams 
Apple 2 Numbers 
Walnut 5 Numbers

1.Take a bowl add cinnamon powder, corn flour, all purpose flour, pinch of salt, baking powder, mix it well, remove the apple skin and cut them in to wedges, put the apple wedges into the batter, and deep fry them.
2. For caramel Heat a pan, add sugar and make a light caramel and drop the deep fried apple wedges. 
3.Drop this caramelized apple in the ice bath, shock and take it out,
4. take the walnut nuts and caramelize it in the rest of the caramel and crush the walnut 
5.and serve it with caramelized apple wedges with scoop of your favorite ice scream.
Cheese Chicken Kebab with Pesto

Hung Curd 2 Tablespoons 
Green Chilly 3 Numbers 
Pepper Powder 1 Teaspoons 
Salt To Taste 
Chicken (boneless) 500 Grams 
Cheese 2 Tablespoons 
Corn Starch 1 Teaspoons

1.Take a bowl add boneless chicken cut it into small pieces and
2. add papaya paste (optional), salt, pepper powder, green chilly, mix this
3.and put it in the refrigerator for 2 hours. Take bowl 
4.add hung curd, processed cheese, pepper powder, corn starch, mix it and make a paste, 
5.add chicken pieces mix it well string the chicken pieces onto skewers,
6. and put it in to the oven for 15 minutes till the kebabs are golden on all sides
7., Chicken will be done, apply the pesto sauce; put it in to the 
8.oven for 2 to 4 minutes.
Asian Noodles with Chicken and Shrimp

Pepper Powder 1 Teaspoons 
Vinegar 1 Tablespoons 
Tomato Ketchup 1 Tablespoons 
Red Chilly Sauce 1 Tablespoons 
Fish Sauce 1 Teaspoons 
Oyster Sauce 1 Teaspoons 
Eggs 2 Numbers 
Broccoli 50 Grams 
Cabbage 50 Grams 
Carrot 50 Grams 
Baby Corns 50 Grams 
Shrimps 100 Grams 
Chicken Juliennes 100 Grams 
Salt To Taste 
Dark Soya Sauce 1 Teaspoons 
Onions 1 Numbers 
Pak Choi 50 Grams 
Bell Peppers (green, Red, Yellow) 50 Grams 
Oil 2 Tablespoons 
Ginger Garlic Juliennes 2 Tablespoons 
Beans Sprout 2 Tablespoons

1.Take a bowl add oyster sauce, fish sauce, red chilly sauce, tomato ketchup, vinegar, pepper powder, salt, dark soya sauce, mix this and keep it aside.
2.Heat oil in a pan add eggs, scrambled and transfer it into a plate.
3. Pour some more oil in a pan add ginger, garlic juliennes, add shrimp, sauté it and add chicken juliennes, cook this some time
4. and add onions, bell peppers (green, red, yellow), baby corn, carrot, cabbage,broccoli, sauté it and pour the slurry of the sauce, mix this add boiled noodles,
5. toss it and add beans sprout, pak choi add scrambled eggs,
6. toss them and sprinkle spring onions and serve it hot.
GOLDEN FRIED PRAWNS

Green Chilly Sauce 1 Tablespoons
Sugar 1 Tablespoons
Corn Flour 2 Tablespoons
Beaten Egg 1 Numbers
Refined Flour 3 Tablespoons
Prawns 6 Numbers
Baking Powder 1 Teaspoons 
Oil For Cooking
Salt To Taste

1. Make a paste of red chilly which is soaked in vinegar, Add the red chilly paste and Garlic,Sugar,tomato ketchup,lemon juice,2 tbs of vinegar and mix it up and pinch of salt till every thing gets completely mixed up.
2.FOR THE BATTER: Take egg add pinch of sugar, salt and chilly sauce add some ice chilled water and whisk them in this add one tbs of oil, cornflower and pinch of baking powder,all purpose powder and mix it up make thick batter and rest of 15 minutes. First devine the prawns,
3. take the prawn but tail on dip it in the batter Leaving the tail by deep fry till it is Golden colored,
4.Serving it with your favorite sauce or sweet Garlic sauce

Coriander Leaves 1 Bunch 
Salt To Taste

Bay Leaves 2 Numbers 
Cashew Nuts 1/4 Cup

Chicken Noodle Soup

Chicken Broth 1 Quart 
Fine Noodles 1 Cup 
Diced Cooked Chicken Meat 1 Cup 
Salt And Pepper To Taste
Minced Parsley 2 Teaspoons
Bring broth to a boil in a large saucepan, add noodles and chicken. \nSimmer uncovered about 10 minutes, until noodles are tender. \nAdd salt and pepper to taste. Stir in parsley and serve hot.
Chinese Hot and Sour Onions

Fresh Red Hot Chillies 3 Numbers 
Large White Onions 2 Numbers 
Oil 2 Tablespoons 
White Vinegar 1 1/2 Cup 
Brown Vinegar 1 1/2 Cup 
Pepper Powder 3-4 Pinch 
Sugar 1/4 Teaspoons 
Salt To Taste

Peel and halve onions, chop into eight chunks each half. 
Slice chillies thin and diagonally. 
Heat oil, add chillies and onions, stirfry for 3-4 minutes. 
Add all other ingredients, saute further 2 minutes. 
Serve hot, with rice or bread.
Potato Chinese

Potatoes Boiled But Firm 3 Numbers 
Spring Onion Chopped Into 1'Pieces 1 Bunch 
Ginger Finely Chopped 1 Teaspoons 
Garlic Finely Chopped 1 Teaspoons 
Red Chilli Finely Chopped (fresh Or Dried) 1/2 Teaspoons 
Sugar 1/2 Teaspoons 
Soya Sauce 1 Teaspoons 
Tomato Sauce 1 Teaspoons 
Cornflour 1 Tablespoons 
Water 1/4 Cup 
Oil 2 Tablespoons 
Salt To Taste

Mix the cornflour and water. Keep aside.
Peel and chop the potatoes into long thick chunks.
Heat oil in a wok or pan, add some potatoes at a time.
Fry till light golden brown. Finish all potatoes similarly.
Keep aside. Remove half the oil.
In the remaining oil, add the chillies, ginger and garlic.
Fry for a minute. Add the potatoes.
Add sauces, salt and sugar. 
Stir well and add the cornflour solution. 
Cook till the wateriness is gone.
Add spring onions and stir. Serve hot.
Hakka Noodles

Boiled Flat Noodles (marketed Also As Hakka Noodles) 2 Cup 
Dried Red Chillies 3 Numbers 
Spring Onion Small 1 Bunch 
Small Capsicum Thinly Sliced 1 Numbers 
Garlic Finely Chopped 2 Teaspoons 
Vinegar 1/2 Teaspoons 
Salt To Taste 
Oil 1 1/2 Teaspoons 
Tandoori Colour A Pinch

Chop the spring onions into 1/4'pieces cut slanting.
Pound red chillies and garlic coarsely.
Heat 1 tbsp. oil, add chilli and garlic and fry for a minute.
Add the capsicum and fry till tender.
Add the spring onion and fry again for 2-3 minutes.
Add noodles and salt and mix well.
Add tandoori colour and vinegar to taste.
Heat very well in oven or microwave before serving.
Serve with schezwan sauce or manchurian in gravy.
Fried Rice

Cabbage Leaves Finely Chopped 2-3 Numbers 
French Beans Finely Chopped 6-7 Numbers 
Soya Sauce 1 1/2 Teaspoons 
Chilli Sauce 1 Teaspoons 
Carrot Finely Chopped 1 Numbers 
Oil 1 Tablespoons 
Spring Onions Finely Chopped 1 Bunch 
Medium Grain Rice 1 Cup

Boil rice till each grain is separate and almost done.
Drain. Cool in a plate.
Heat oil in a wok or pan, add vegetables, except spring onions.
Stir fry till crisp, add spring onions, salt and sauces.
Mix well and pour over the rice.
Mix the rice and vegatables gently, till evenly coated.
Adjust sauces and salt as per taste.
Just before serving heat very well. Either heat in oven or microwave.
Serve hot with manchurian vegetable or sweet sour.
Bean Sprouts

Bean Sprouts 1 Cup 
Cup Water 1 1/2 Cup 
Cornflour 1 Tablespoons 
Grated Ginger 1 Teaspoons 
Soya Sauce 1/2 Teaspoons 
Spring Onion Finely Chopped 1 Tablespoons 
Oil 1/2 Tablespoons 
Salt And Pepper To Taste

1.Boil the sprouts so that they are done but not soggy. Drain and spread on a plate. Mix the cornflour in 1/2 cup water. 
2.Heat oil in a pan, add ginger and fry for a minute. 
3.Add the remaining water (1 cup). Bring to a boil. 
4.Add the cornflour mixture, and stir till it comes back to a boil. 
5.Add the soya sauce and salt and pepper to taste. 
6.Pour thick gravy onto the bean sprouts. 
7.Sprinkle the chopped spring onion on top. 
8.Serve hot with steamed rice or fried rice
Noodle Soup

Chicken Stock 6 Cup 
Packet Clear Noodles 1/2 Numbers 
Freshly Minced Ginger 1 1/2 Teaspoons 
Sliced Mushrooms 1/2 Cup 
Carrot, Sliced Diagonally 1 Numbers 
Pepper To Taste 
Salt To Taste 
Chopped Spring Onion 2 Tablespoons 
Soy Sauce 1 Tablespoons 
Onion, Chopped Finely 1 Numbers 
Snowpeas, Diagonally Cut Into Pieces 1 Cup 
Sesame Oil 1 Teaspoons 
Crushed Dry Red Chillies 1/4 Teaspoons 
Vegetable Oil 2 Tablespoons

1.Put crushed chilli and sesame oil 
2.Keep aside for atleast 1 hour to get the flavour of chilli in oil 
3.Put noodles in boiling water, cover it 
4.Let it stand for 5 minutes 
5.Drain and run it through cold water 
6.Separate the noodles and let it cool 
7.Heat vegetable oil in a wok 
8.Add onion, saute for 2 minutes 
9.Add carrots and ginger and stir-fry for another 2-3 minutes 
10.Add stock, soy sauce 
11.Bring it to boil 
12.Add mushrooms, noodles and salt 
13.Boil it for another 2 minutes 
14.Add snowpeas, let it boil till snowpeas are tender (approx 3-4 mins) 
15.Add chilli flavoured sesame oil, pepper 
16.Serve hot while garnishing with spring onion
Billy Kee Chicken

Chicken 1500 Grams 
Egg Yolks, Lightly Beaten 3 Numbers 
Oil To Fry 
Dry Red Wine 1/2 Cup 
Tomato Sauce 1/2 Cup 
Worcestershire Sauce 1 Teaspoons

Cut chicken into serving seized pieces; remove skin, cut chicken from bones.
Chop chicken, combine with egg yolks; mix well.
Deep-fry chicken in batches in hot oil until lightly browned and just cooked through, remove from work; drain on absorbent paper.
Drain oil from work. Add combined wine, and sauces to work, stir over heat until sauce boils.
Stir in chicken pieces, simmer until heated through.
Fried Noodles
Egg Noodles 250 Grams\nOil To Fry

Add Noodles to large pan of boiling water, boil, uncovered, 5 minutes or until tender. 
Separate noodles with a fork during cooking.
Drain noodles well; spread out on oven tray which has been lined with absorbent paper; allow to dry.
Using tongs, drop small amounts of noodles into hot oil, deep-fry until golden brown, turning once.
Remove noodles from oil; drain on absorbent paper. 
Repeat procedure with remaining noodles.
Marinated Chicken Wings

Spring Onion, Sliced 6 Numbers 
Cloves Garlic, Crushed 2 Numbers 
Soy Sauce 2 Tablespoons 
Dry Sherry 2 Tablespoons 
Grated Fresh Ginger 1 Teaspoons 
Brown Sugar 1 1/2 Teaspoons 
Chicken Wings 750 Grams 
Oil 1/4 Cup 
Cornflour 1 Tablespoons 
Water 3/4 Cup 
Bamboo Shoots, Drained, Sliced 345 Grams
Chicken Stock Cube 1 Numbers

Combine onion, garlic, soy sauce, sherry, ginger, sugar and Chicken wings in bowl; mix well.
Stand 1 hour drain, reserve marinade.
Heat oil in work or frying pan, add bamboo shoots, stir-fry 2 minutes, remove from work.
Add chicken wings to work, stir-fry until golden brown.
Reduce heat, cook further 15 minutes or until chicken is cooked through.
Stir in blended cornflour, water, crumbled stock cube and reserved marinade, stir until sauce boils.
Add bamboo shoots, reduce heat, simmer further 2 minutes.
Cheese And Pasta Salad

Finley Chopped Capsicum 1/4 Cup 
Finley Chopped Carrot 1/4 Cup 
Finely Chopped Spring Onions 1/2 Cup 
Boiled Penne Pasta 2 Cup 
White Pipper 1/2 Teaspoons 
Salt To Taste To Taste

1.Heat a large pan of water.Add 2 table spoons of oil and dash of salt to it.Bring to the boil. When the water starts boiling add the pasta to it. Let it cook on medium flame till the pasta becomes soft,but still firm.
2.Mix the inggredients for the dressing to make a smooth paste.
3.Mix the ingredients for the salad and pour the dressing over it.
4.Toss well.serve chilled.
